mapper.sql: a.SCHED_NAME AS schedName , a.JOB_NAME AS jobName , a.JOB_GROUP AS jobGroup , a.DESCRIPTION AS description , a.JOB_CLASS_NAME AS jobClassName , a.IS_DURABLE AS isDurable , a.IS_NONCONCURRENT AS isNonconcurrent , a.IS_UPDATE_DATA AS isUpdateData , a.REQUESTS_RECOVERY AS requestsRecovery , a.JOB_DATA AS jobData , triggers.NEXT_FIRE_TIME AS nextFireTime , triggers.PREV_FIRE_TIME AS prevFireTime , triggers.START_TIME AS startTime , triggers.END_TIME AS endTime , triggers.TRIGGER_STATE AS triggerState
JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS qts ON qts.JOB_NAME = a.JOB_NAME AND qts.JOB_GROUP = a.JOB_GROUP JOIN QRTZ_GROUP qgp ON qgp.GROUP_NAME = a.JOB_GROUP
